page.title: 08BO'NESS -A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: On a Saturday I get up at about 7.45a.m. Then I have my breakfast at 8.15a.m. After that I make my bed and brush my teeth. I do something till 10.00 because then I go to football practice. I come home at 11.00. I have a drink, then go out to play by myself. I go shopping to Falkirk Market then into the town. I come home and have lunch at 2.00.p.m. I go down to the town and get some sweets for after tea. When I finish my tea I go down to Craig's house and play till 6 00.p.m. I play with my lego until 7.00. I then help my mum wash the dishes. I read my book then at 8.00.p.m. I get changed into my pyjamas and go to bed at 9.00.p.m.
